argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | equs45f.1 | |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_sbimi | |- ( [ y / x ] ph -> [ y / x ] A. y ph ) |
| 3 |  | #P_sb4a | |- ( [ y / x ] A. y ph -> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( [ y / x ] ph -> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_sb2 | |- ( A. x ( x = y -> ph ) -> [ y / x ] ph ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_impbii | |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) |
\
 Equivalence for substitution when ` y ` is not free in ` ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Revised by NM, 30-Apr-2008.)
